messages.noPrivateMessages: I do not reply to private messages.
messages.voiceChannelNeeded: You need to be in a voice channel to use this command.
messages.cannotConnect: I cannot connect to your voice channel, make sure I have the proper permissions!
messages.noArgs: You have to enter a search term.
messages.sameVoiceChannel: You must be in the same vocal channel as the bot to be able to listen to music.
messages.noMoreSongs: There is no more songs in the playlist.
messages.volBeetween: Volume must be a number between `0` and `100`!
messages.validNumberPosition: The position must be a valid number higher than `0`.
messages.couldNotBeFound: This sound could not be found.
messages.restrictedOrNotFound: This song is restricted or could not be found!
messages.hasBeenAdded: has been added to the queue.
messages.errorWhileParsingVideo: An error occured while searching the video.
messages.errorWhileParsingPlaylist: An error occured while parsing the playlist songs.

addEmbed.hasBeenAdded: has been added to the queue.
